author: wtopstaff
title: Hornets-Heat, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 4, 2015 8:35 pm CHARLOTTE (90) 
Hairston 1-7 2-3 4, M.Williams 1-4 2-2 4, Zeller 3-3 0-0 8, Walker 4-11 6-7 17, Lamb 2-11 4-4 8, Hansbrough 1-4 2-4 4, Kaminsky 3-11 0-0 9, Lin 3-7 4-5 10, Roberts 6-11 6-6 21, Harrison 1-3 0-0 3, Washburn 0-0 0-0 0, Thompson 1-2 0-0 2. Totals 26-74 26-31 90. MIAMI (77) 
Deng 3-7 1-1 7, Bosh 6-11 2-3 14, Haslem 0-0 0-0 0, Dragic 1-3 0-0 2, Wade 5-11 2-3 12, Green 5-14 1-1 12, McRoberts 2-5 0-0 5, Stoudemire 5-11 2-2 12, Chalmers 1-3 0-0 3, Winslow 2-9 5-8 9, Andersen 0-1 0-0 0, Johnson 0-1 1-2 1, Whittington 0-3 0-0 0, Richardson 0-2 0-0 0. Totals 30-81 14-20 77. Charlotte
